generated_body: The article likely discusses the controversial disappearance of a general who was a leading suspect in a significant anti-corruption case in Mexico. Readers can expect an overview of the circumstances surrounding the case, including details about the allegations against the general and the implications of his disappearance for ongoing investigations. The piece may also explore the broader context of corruption within the Mexican military and government, as well as potential reactions from officials and the public. Overall, it could provide insight into how this incident reflects larger issues of accountability in Mexico.
